LanguageData.Hediff_AEFatigue.label: 疲勞
LanguageData.Hediff_AEFatigue.description: 身體昏沉，需要額外的休息
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.label: 蘋果效應
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.description: 果實對身體產生影響。\n它似乎讓宿主的思想更加敏銳，令其更加睿智。
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.0.label: 尋索
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.1.label: 覺知
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.2.label: 啟悟
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.3.label: 超脫
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.4.label: 懲罰
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.5.label: 憤怒
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruitWithdrawal.label: 禁果影響抑制
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruitWithdrawal.descri: 減輕禁果對身體的影響。\n這似乎會減弱宿主對超凡壓力的感受。
LanguageData.Hediff_AEDigestingPie.label: 正在消化派
